verses.t: Wherefore{G3606}, holy{G40} brethren{G80}, partakers{G3353} of the heavenly{G2032} calling{G2821}, consider{G2657} the Apostle{G3588} and{G2532} High Priest{G749} of{G3588} our{G2257} profession{G3671}, Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424};
Who was{G5607} faithful{G4103} to him that appointed{G4160} him{G846}, as{G5613} also{G2532} Moses{G3475} was faithful in{G1722} all{G3650} his{G846} house{G3588}.

For{G1063} this{G3778} man was counted worthy{G515} of{G1391} more{G4119} glory{G1391} than{G3844} Moses{G3475}, in{G2596}asmuch as{G3745} he who hath builded{G2680} the house{G846} hath{G2192} more{G4119} honour{G5092} than the house{G3588}.
For{G1063} every{G3956} house{G3624} is builded{G2680} by{G5259} some{G5100} man; but{G1161} he that built{G2680} all things{G3956} is God{G2316}.

And{G2532} Moses{G3475} verily{G3303} was faithful{G4103} in{G1722} all{G3650} his{G846} house{G3588}, as{G5613} a servant{G2324}, for{G1519} a testimony{G3142} of those things which were to be spoken after{G2980};

But{G1161} Christ{G5547} as{G5613} a son{G5207} over{G1909} his own{G846} house{G3588}; whose{G3739} house{G3624} are we{G2070}, if{G1437} we{G2249} hold fast{G2722} the confidence{G3588} and{G2532} the rejoicing{G3588} of the hope{G3588} firm{G949} unto{G3360} the end{G5056}.
Wherefore{G1352} (as{G2531} the{G3588} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} saith{G3004}, To day{G4594} if{G1437} ye will hear{G191} his{G846} voice{G3588},
Harden{G4645} not{G3361} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}, as{G5613} in{G1722} the provocation{G3588}, in{G2596} the day{G3588} of temptation{G3588} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2048}:
When{G3757} your{G5216} fathers{G3588} tempted{G3985} me{G3165}, proved{G1381} me{G3165}, and{G2532} saw{G1492} my{G3450} works{G3588} forty{G5062} years{G2094}.

Wherefore{G1352} I was grieved with{G4360} that{G1565} generation{G3588}, and{G2532} said{G2036}, They do{G4105} alway{G104} err{G4105} in{G3588} their heart{G2588}; and{G1161} they{G846} have{G1097} not{G3756} known{G1097} my{G3450} ways{G3588}.
So{G5613} I sware{G3660} in{G1722} my{G3450} wrath{G3588}, They shall{G1525} not{G1487} enter{G1525} into{G1519} my{G3450} rest{G3588}.)

Take heed{G991}, brethren{G80}, lest{G3379} there be{G2071} in{G1722} any{G5100} of you{G5216} an{G2588} evil{G4190} heart{G2588} of unbelief{G570}, in{G1722} departing{G868} from{G575} the living{G2198} God{G2316}.

But{G235} exhort{G3870} one another{G1438} daily{G2250}, while{G891} it is called{G2564} To day{G4594}; lest{G2443} any{G5100} of{G1537} you{G5216} be hardened{G4645} through the deceitfulness{G539} of sin{G3588}.
For{G1063} we are made{G1096} partakers{G3353} of Christ{G3588}, if{G1437} we hold{G2722} the beginning{G3588} of our confidence{G3588} stedfast{G949} unto{G3360} the end{G5056};
While{G1722} it is said{G3004}, To day{G4594} if{G1437} ye will hear{G191} his{G846} voice{G3588}, harden{G4645} not{G3361} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}, as{G5613} in{G1722} the provocation{G3588}.
For{G1063} some{G5100}, when they had heard{G191}, did provoke{G3893}: howbeit{G235} not{G3756} all{G3956} that came{G1831} out of{G1537} Egypt{G125} by{G1223} Moses{G3475}.

But{G1161} with whom{G5101} was he grieved{G4360} forty{G5062} years{G2094}? was it not{G3780} with them that had sinned{G264}, whose{G3739} carcases{G3588} fell{G4098} in{G1722} the wilderness{G2048}?
And{G1161} to whom{G5101} sware he{G3660} that{G3361} they should{G1525} not{G3361} enter{G1525} into{G1519} his{G846} rest{G3588}, but{G1487} to them that believed not{G544}?
So{G2532} we see{G991} that{G3754} they could{G1410} not{G3756} enter in{G1525} because of{G1223} unbelief{G570}.
